lenders.name: RJKK
lenders.loan_because: "The King replied "Whenever you did it for any of my people, you did it for me."

lenders.occupational_info: I do not work any more due to a variety of medical problems.  Family and friends helped me through periods when I had no income, and now I am doing what I can to help others in need.

lenders.name: Charisse
lenders.loan_because: I was given a gift certificate and discovered an amazing community which provides a rare service: person-to-person micro-lending opportunities. Often times I wonder how I can help those who want to gain financial independence and Kiva allows me to do this.

lenders.name: I & P
lenders.loan_because: I believe we are all equal In the eyes of God. We should be able to lean on each other in hard times insted of a government institution. lenders.name: April
lenders.loan_because: My husband is working in the middle East, and he always tells me personal stories about people that live there.  I felt this was a way to reach out to them.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of a house, a husband, and two children 24 hours a day.

lenders.name: taheerah
lenders.loan_because: i believe it's what GOD wants us all to do. it's not the size of the loan that counts, but the size of your heart.
lenders.occupational_info: keeping up with 4 teens, a 5 year old, a husband, and 3 pets is alot of work.

lenders.name: Graeme
lenders.loan_because: These folk deserve and chance.

lenders.name: Victoria and Family
lenders.loan_because: My family and I have been blessed by others helping us through out our lives and career and would like to extend the same type of opportunities to other.
lenders.occupational_info:
My husband and I and another woman own a software company.  Our company develops and sells software which helps companies move data between different applications.

We love owning our company and setting our direction.  When our children were small, having our own company that allowed us to work and still be heavily involved in our childrens' lives and activities.

We hope that through these small loans that you will be able to acheive success and your dreams.

lenders.loan_because: "You make a living by what you get. You make a life by what you give." - Winston Churchill.
lenders.occupational_info: Live life at its fullest.  I Live, I Work, I Loan!

lenders.occupational_info: I proofread depositions taken in civil legal cases.

lenders.name: Jenn and Dan
lenders.loan_because:
We have visited many impoverished countries and saw how difficult life is for those who had to scrape by with only a few dollars a week.  The difference between poverty in the developing and developed world is enormous.      

 * Almost half the world — over three billion people — live on less than $2.50 a day. * 25,000 children die each day due to poverty
*1.6 billion people — a quarter of humanity — live without electricity  www.globalissues.org/article/26/poverty-facts-and-stats

lenders.name: NYC Cat Lady
lenders.loan_because: We are the 8%: If you have money in the bank, your wallet, and some spare change you are among the top 8% of the world’s wealthy.
lenders.occupational_info:
If you have food in your fridge, clothes on your back, a roof over your head and a place to sleep you are richer than 75% of the world.
 
If you have money in the bank, your wallet, and some spare change you are among the top 8% of the world’s wealthy.
 
If you woke up this morning with more health than illness you are more blessed than the million people who will not survive this week.
 
If you have never experienced the danger of battle, the agony of imprisonment or torture, or the horrible pangs of starvation you are luckier than 500 million people alive and suffering.
 
If you can read this message you are more fortunate than 3 billion people in the world who cannot read it at all
